subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Boston Marathon
Running
lead_paragraph: The 2,300 runners who were affected by a technical problem with the timing system at the New York City Marathon were asked by race organizers to submit their time according to their own measurement.
snippet: The 2,300 runners who were affected by a technical problem with the timing system at the New York City Marathon were asked by race organizers to submit their time according to their own measurement.
